Test Name: Target Antigen Identification in Membranous Nephropathy (Mass Spectrometry)
Specimen Type: Kidney biopsy tissue (fresh frozen or FFPE)
Purpose: To precisely identify target antigens associated with membranous nephropathy in tissue samples via mass spectrometry.
Container: Cryovial for fresh frozen tissue or FFPE tissue block
Equipment: LC-MS/MS mass spectrometer (with associated sample preparation instruments)
